val DatasetId = 1
val StudyName = "anticipation"

val WorkDir = s"/tmp/$StudyName"
val DisambigDir = s"$WorkDir/disambiguation"

paragraphs.title: Case sensitivity

result.msg:
import scala.util.hashing.MurmurHash3
hash: (s: String)Long
hashUDF: org.apache.spark.sql.UserDefinedFunction = UserDefinedFunction(<function1>,LongType,List(StringType))

paragraphs.title: institutions2

result.msg: institutions2: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [pub_id: bigint, idx: smallint, address: string, enhanced_names: array<string>, city_geoname_id: int, lc_address: string, lc_address_id: bigint]

paragraphs.title: Sanity checks
paragraphs.text:
/*
- no hash collisions
*/

assert(institutions2.select('lc_address, 'lc_address_id).distinct.groupBy('lc_address).count().filter('count > 1).count() == 0)

val addressCount = institutions2.count()
val distinctAddressCount = institutions2.select('lc_address_id).distinct.count()

def addressPercentage(x: Long): Float = (x / addressCount.toFloat) * 100
def distinctAddressPercentage(x: Long): Float = (x / distinctAddressCount.toFloat) * 100

val distinctCounts = Seq(
    institutions2.filter('enhanced_names.isNotNull).select('lc_address_id).distinct.count(),
    institutions2.filter('enhanced_names.isNull).select('lc_address_id).distinct.count(),
    institutions2.selectExpr("lc_address_id", "sort_array(enhanced_names)").distinct.groupBy('lc_address_id).count().filter('count > 1).count(),
    institutions2.explode("enhanced_names", "enhanced_name")((a: Seq[String]) => Option(a).getOrElse(Seq.empty)).selectExpr("lower(enhanced_name)").distinct.count())

val distinctPercentages = distinctCounts.map(distinctAddressPercentage)

result.msg:
addressCount: Long = 2580
distinctAddressCount: Long = 2308
addressPercentage: (x: Long)Float
distinctAddressPercentage: (x: Long)Float
distinctCounts: Seq[Long] = List(1933, 377, 2, 770)
distinctPercentages: Seq[Float] = List(83.75217, 16.33449, 0.08665511, 33.362217)

paragraphs.title: Metrics 1/2
paragraphs.text:
println(s"addresses: $addressCount")
println(f"distinct addresses: $distinctAddressCount (${addressPercentage(distinctAddressCount)}%.2f %%)")
println()
println(f"distinct addresses with enhanced name(s): ${distinctCounts(0)} (${distinctPercentages(0)}%.2f %%)")
println(f"distinct addresses without enhanced name(s): ${distinctCounts(1)} (${distinctPercentages(1)}%.2f %%)")
println(f"distinct addresses with different enhanced name(s) associations: ${distinctCounts(2)} (${distinctPercentages(2)}%.2f %%)")
println()
println(f"distinct enhanced names: ${distinctCounts(3)} (${distinctPercentages(3)}%.2f %%)")

result.msg:
addresses: 2580
distinct addresses: 2308 (89.46 %)

distinct addresses with enhanced name(s): 1933 (83.75 %)
distinct addresses without enhanced name(s): 377 (16.33 %)
distinct addresses with different enhanced name(s) associations: 2 (0.09 %)

distinct enhanced names: 770 (33.36 %)

paragraphs.title: Metrics 2/2
paragraphs.text:
// Number of enhanced names by distinct lower case address
institutions2.selectExpr("lc_address_id", "sort_array(enhanced_names) as sorted_enhanced_names").distinct.selectExpr("size(sorted_enhanced_names) as enhanced_name_count").describe("enhanced_name_count").show()

%sql
select distinct c, lc_address, enhanced_names
from
institutions_2 t
join (
    select lc_address_id, count(*) as c
    from (
        select distinct lc_address_id, sort_array(enhanced_names)
        from institutions_2
        ) t1
    group by lc_address_id
    ) t2
on t.lc_address_id = t2.lc_address_id
where c > 1
order by c, t.lc_address desc
limit 50

2	empa, st gallen, switzerland	null
2	empa, st gallen, switzerland	WrappedArray(Swiss Federal Laboratories for Materials Science & Technology (EMPA))

paragraphs.title: aggregatedEnhancedNames (sorted)
Metrics
paragraphs.text: println("distinct addresses with enhanced name(s), gain: " + (distinctCounts(1) - aggregatedEnhancedNames.filter('aggregated_enhanced_names.isNull).count()))

result.msg: distinct addresses with enhanced name(s), gain: 2
